title: stuck on "retrieving data from servers"
body:
im trying to blind pick normal, and everytime i try it i get a popup saying "retrieving data from servers"

i restarted and everything, still not working

replies.body:
Sounds like your client is having a hard time being able to talk with our servers for some strange reason. You're able to get through our login servers, but once you try to queue for a game the client can't quite get a strong enough link with our servers to put you into the queue. 

Let's go through the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure we cover all of our bases. Hit me up if you have any other issues!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Pq51fAwL,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-10T02:51:42.416+0000)
>
> Sounds like your client is having a hard time being able to talk with our servers for some strange reason. You're able to get through our login servers, but once you try to queue for a game the client can't quite get a strong enough link with our servers to put you into the queue. 
> 
> Let's go through the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure we cover all of our bases. Hit me up if you have any other issues!
